item.title: Releasing the LOOK Dataset
item.description: The LOOK dataset is finally online! Please look at the intructions below in order to understand how the dataset has been created. Introduction We provide an open-source, high quality labeled dataset for the in-the-wild eye contact detection task. Eye contact detection is a practically important task to better understand and forecast human behaviors. In particular,autonomous robots and self driving cars need to solve this task to navigate safely around humans, and act accordingly to this new modality.
